response.original_title: คอนเสิร์ตแบบเบิร์ดเบิร์ดโชว์ ครั้งที่ 9 ตอน MAGIC MEMORIES อัศจรรย์แห่งความ ทรงจำสิ่งเหล่านี้คือความเป็นเรา...ตลอดไป (อังกอร์พลัส)
response.overview: Magic Memories is a Bird Bird Show concert by Thongchai McIntyre, performed for the 9th time in 2008, held at Impact Arena, Muang Thong Thani, 12 shows, which is the most It was the first time that a BirdBird concert was performed at Impact Arena, Muang Thong Thani, with an audience of 120,000 people[3] and Sanook.com It has been ranked as one of the coolest concerts of the year. The format of the concert includes singing, dancing, playing all forms, with many guests. In addition to the concert performance, There are also shows in the form of romance, drama, and fantasy, with the splendor of the show coming with a large ship on stage.
response.title: Babb Bird Bird Show #9/2008 Magic Memories (Encore Plus) 2009 New Year Bonus

cast.name: Thongchai McIntyre
cast.original_name: ธงไชย แมคอินไตย์
